es.uvigo.esei.amchartsJava.core.api.trendLines

Interface ITrendLineXyChartController

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ITrendLineSerialChartController
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    TrendLineXyChartController

    public interface ITrendLineXyChartController
extends ITrendLineSerialChartController
    Interface for TrendLineXyChartController. This interface contains properties of TrendLine only used by xy charts. Details of TrendLine and its properties in AmCharts API.
    Author:
    Iago Fernández Cuñarro

        void setValueAxisX(java.lang.String valueAxisX)
            throws ChartException
        Set valueAxisX property.
        Parameters:
        valueAxisX - ValueAxis id.
        Throws:
        ChartException - Chart that use trendLine doesn't contains a ValueAxis with id equals to valueAxisX.
